name: AppleCurators.Attributes
desc: The attributes for an Apple curator resource.

items.name: editorialNotes
items.desc: The notes about the curator that appear in the Apple Music catalog.

items.name: kind
items.desc: The type of curator. Possible values are:Curator: An individual curator entity.Genre: A curator that represents a cohesive music genre.Show: A curator associated with a particular Apple Music show.

items.name: name
items.desc: The localized name of the curator.

items.name: shortName
items.desc: The localized shortened name of the curator.

items.name: showHostName
items.desc: The name of the host if kind is Show.

items.name: url
items.desc: The URL for sharing the curator in Apple Music.
